channel.title: Market Growth on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Market Growth on FinanClub

item.title: CHPT
item.description: score:1084 Chances: The EV charging market is expected to reach $76.9 billion by 2027, creating growth opportunities for companies like ChargePoint. Global sales of electric vehicles (EVs) are expected to increase by 35% in 2023, driving demand for EV charging solutions. Demand for EVs and EV charging facilities is on the rise due to government support and climate change awareness.

item.title: PLUG
item.description: score:993 Chances: The transition to the green economy and the shift from fossil fuel to renewable energy sources, including hydrogen, presents significant growth opportunities for Plug Power (PLUG). Plug Power’s expanding customer base and increased sites with fuel contracts are expected to positively impact its Q2 earnings results.
